bookinfo.title: Building the Service Tier Course Syllabus
bookinfo.subtitle: with EJB and JBoss/Wildfly

listitem.para: Course combines a mixture of presentation, discussion, and lab exercises to provide an introduction and thorough coverage of building the service tier of an enterprise application
Concepts are based on JavaEE standards and grounded using a specific JavaEE provider (JBoss/Wildfly Application Server)
Lab environment is based on Maven and IDE agnostic (this is not an IDE wizard course)
